Testimonials.text: "لم اكن اؤمن بالاكتحانات الغير ورقية و لكن بعد تجربة هذا المنج غيرت رأيي"
Testimonials.name: John Doe

Testimonials.text: "ان لم تجربه بعد فأنت يفوتك الكثير"
Testimonials.name: Johnathan Doe

Features.title: Automatic exam grading
Features.text: Examiners are provided with a form to enter questions and answers and the system handles the grading.

Features.title: Coding exams
Features.text: Thanks to the nature of our online examination system, coding exams are taken the way they should be, on computer.

Features.title: Remote proctoring
Features.text: Proctors are given access to the system to allow them to supervise students from anywhere.

Features.title: Examinee chat
Features.text: Examiners and proctors can easily communicate with examinees to alert them of any malicious actions.
